select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into LIMS_TESTING_TECHNICAL_ANALY_CNV_ANALYSIS_PIC (ID,SAMPLE_TEST_ID, IMAGE_NAME, IMAGE_URL,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,IS_COLLECTION,CLINICAL_JUDGMENT) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleTestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isCollection,jdbcType=BIT}, #{clinicalJudgment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update LIMS_TESTING_TECHNICAL_ANALY_CNV_ANALYSIS_PIC
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=Integer},
SAMPLE_TEST_ID = #{sampleTestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE_NAME = #{imageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LIMS_TESTING_TECHNICAL_ANALY_CNV_ANALYSIS_PIC set IMAGE_NAME = #{imageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_COLLECTION = #{isCollection,jdbcType=BIT}, CLINICAL_JUDGMENT = #{clinicalJudgment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select p.ID, p.SAMPLE_TEST_ID, p.IMAGE_NAME, p.IMAGE_URL from LIMS_TESTING_TECHNICAL_ANALY_CNV_ANALYSIS_PIC p where SAMPLE_TEST_ID = #{0} and p.ID in (select CNV_ANALYSIS_ID from LIMS_TESTING_TECHNICAL_ANALY_CNV_ANALYSIS_COLLECTION where DOCTOR_ID =#{1} and REF = 'pic')
